ygData.subject: Re: This is what I have so far on jewelry
ygData.msgSnippet: There is also a 36th level Enchanter on one of the servers that was saying how he constantly solos yellows even at that level.  Apparently with Illusion: Fire
ygData.messageBody:
There is also a 36th level Enchanter on one of the servers that was saying
how he constantly solos yellows even at that level. Apparently with
Illusion: Fire Elemental we can hit for 80dmg a pop!

Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
http://www.hoa-rpg.com/
